mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sdk_id AS "sdkId", a.lci_kind AS "lciKind", a.major_id AS "majorId", a.company AS "company", a.lecturer AS "lecturer", a.viewcnt AS "viewcnt", a.vedio_url AS "vedioUrl", a.videosrt_url AS "videosrtUrl", a.videopic_url AS "videopicUrl", a.videobigpic_url AS "videobigpicUrl", a.number AS "number", a.assistanttoken AS "assistanttoken", a.studenttoken AS "studenttoken", a.teachertoken AS "teachertoken", a.studentclienttoken AS "studentclienttoken", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.webjoin AS "webjoin", a.clientjoin AS "clientjoin", a.invaliddate AS "invaliddate", a.teacherjoinurl AS "teacherjoinurl", a.studentjoinurl AS "studentjoinurl", a.code AS "code", a.message AS "message", a.introduce AS "introduce", a.lecturerpic_url AS "lecturerpicUrl", a.lecturer_introduce AS "lecturerIntroduce", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO live_course( id, name, sdk_id, lci_kind, major_id, company, lecturer, viewcnt, vedio_url, videosrt_url, videopic_url, videobigpic_url, number, assistanttoken, studenttoken, teachertoken, studentclienttoken, startdate, webjoin, clientjoin, invaliddate, teacherjoinurl, studentjoinurl, code, message, introduce, lecturerpic_url, lecturer_introduce, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sdkId}, #{lciKind}, #{majorId}, #{company}, #{lecturer}, #{viewcnt}, #{vedioUrl}, #{videosrtUrl}, #{videopicUrl}, #{videobigpicUrl}, #{number}, #{assistanttoken}, #{studenttoken}, #{teachertoken}, #{studentclienttoken}, #{startdate}, #{webjoin}, #{clientjoin}, #{invaliddate}, #{teacherjoinurl}, #{studentjoinurl}, #{code}, #{message}, #{introduce}, #{lecturerpicUrl}, #{lecturerIntroduce}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE live_course SET name = #{name}, sdk_id = #{sdkId}, lci_kind = #{lciKind}, major_id = #{majorId}, company = #{company}, lecturer = #{lecturer}, viewcnt = #{viewcnt}, vedio_url = #{vedioUrl}, videosrt_url = #{videosrtUrl}, videopic_url = #{videopicUrl}, videobigpic_url = #{videobigpicUrl}, number = #{number}, assistanttoken = #{assistanttoken}, studenttoken = #{studenttoken}, teachertoken = #{teachertoken}, studentclienttoken = #{studentclienttoken}, startdate = #{startdate}, webjoin = #{webjoin}, clientjoin = #{clientjoin}, invaliddate = #{invaliddate}, teacherjoinurl = #{teacherjoinurl}, studentjoinurl = #{studentjoinurl}, code = #{code}, message = #{message}, introduce = #{introduce}, lecturerpic_url = #{lecturerpicUrl}, lecturer_introduce = #{lecturerIntroduce}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
